{
    group1: {
      - baz: bas
      + baz: bars
        foo: bar
      - nest: {
            key: value
        }
      + nest: str
    }
  - group2: {
        abc: 12345
        deep: {
            id: 45
        }
    }
  + group3: {
        fee: 100500
        deep: {
            id: {
                number: 45
            }
        }
    }
}
